head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Transit Worker Killed By Train

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Manufacturing, Operations and Logistics

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Transit Worker Killed By Train

body.head.byline: By JENNIFER 8. LEE; Compiled by John Sullivan

block.p: A transit worker was accidentally killed by a train in the Columbus Circle station in Manhattan late last night, the police said. The worker, whose identity had not been released, was hit around 11:25 p.m. and declared dead at the scene. Trains were stopped for at least half an hour while investigators were at the scene. It was not immediately clear why the worker was on the track, the police said.
